0102.name: Unknown
0102.message:
This device's access to online services
has been restricted by Nintendo.

For help, visit support.nintendo.com.
0102.long_description: Your account or Nintendo 3DS console has been banned from online play.
0102.short_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get banned.
0102.long_solution: Appeal the ban by requesting to speak to a moderator in the [Discord server](https://invite.gg/pretendo).
